bio.name: Mike Mitchel
bio.intro: Highly skilled Principal Consultant & Full Stack Engineer with 10 years of experience in product discovery, project planning, team management, and crafting robust & easy to maintain code that delivers exceptional value.

experience.role: Co-Founder | Chief Technical Officer | Chief of Sales

highlights.item: Fractional co-ownership of luxury vacation homes.

projects.name: 8 Home Share Calendar Tool
projects.details: Create an automated tool to generate a calendar for a fractional vacation home, based on a complex set of rotating rules

projects.name: Sales & Marketing
projects.stack: Generative AI, Social Media, Print and Web Marketing
projects.details: Create an engaging media presence to educate and close sales with local real estate agents and clients, in addition to face-to-face sales and marketing

experience.role: Founder | Principal Consultant | Full Stack Engineer

highlights.item: Full stack software consulting and development.

projects.name: CALI.org
projects.stack: CanJS, NodeJS, PHP, Bootstrap, jQuery, AMP stack
projects.details: Authoring Guideline Feature: Added type-safe authoring controls (e.g., form validation, templating safeguards) to improve document assembly reliability. Stack: CanJS, Node.js, PHP.

projects.name: BCBC.bike Shop App
projects.details: Delivered mobile-first, responsive design with TypeScript and modern UI/UX best practices.

highlights.item: Focus on personal well-being, renewed creative energy, and sharpened mission alignment. Happy to discuss the benefits of career breaks and how they contribute to long-term professional growth.

Guided successful projects as the Principal Consultant for main client stakeholders, delivering high value software and tooling. Managed client and consultant team members as a Senior Developer Team Lead, providing code reviews, best code practices mentorship, career development training, and guidance on maintaining work/life balance.

projects.name: KFC.com - KFC Order App
projects.stack: React, Typescript, Jest, NextJS, Storybook, GraphQL
projects.details: KFC customer order app, Refactored the entire web app, improving test coverage by 30%.

projects.name: A2JAuthor.com - Access to Justice App Suite
projects.stack: CanJS, NodeJS, PHP, Bootstrap, jQuery, AMP stack
projects.details: Multi-repo Access to Justice application with nearly 1 million runs per year, Full stack development across a suite of 3 applications, Authoring Tool, Viewing Tool, and Document Assembly Tool

projects.name: Epiqar.com - Surgical Sales and Collaboration Video Conference App
projects.stack: CanJS, NodeJS, AWS S3, Amazon SQS, HTML5 Video/Audio/Canvas
projects.details: Medical video conference app for remote surgery and medical sales, Added high-quality snapshot feature allowing doctors to capture key moments including on-screen annotations

projects.name: CanJS.com - Open Source client-side JavaScript architectural libraries
projects.details: Direct feature and bug-fix open source contributions to a full feature Javascript framework and set of tools including CanJS, DoneJS, StealJS and testing stack.

highlights.item: Assistant Instructor to 2 boot camp cohorts, teaching new devs the fundamentals of Full Stack Development.

projects.name: Internal Employee Schedule App
projects.details: Staffing app to record and manage student instructor hours, duties, and weekly schedule and responsibilities.

highlights.item: Built a successful IT consulting business by delivering exceptional value through superior System Administration, Networking, and HelpDesk services, creating a strong referral pipeline. Sold the client list to pursue web development.

skills: Generative AI (ChatGPT, Claude, Copilot, Prompt Engineering)
